languages.text: {n}Ризза бледнеет.{/n} "А вы умеете убеждать, Ваша Светлость. Я отчетливо чувствую мотивацию немедленно приступить к делу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ризза бледнеет.{/n} "Если почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая} ставит вопрос подобным образом... То, видимо, выбора у меня нет, не так ли?"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."

languages.text: {n}莱萨的脸色变得煞白。{/n}“你的话很有说服力，大人。我马上就感觉到，我必须得打起精神好好干了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."

traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}リザは青白くなる。{/n}「すばらしい説得力をお持ちですね、陛下。久しぶりに、取引をしたくなりましたよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは青白くなる。{/n}「すばらしい説得力をお持ちですね、陛下。久しぶりに、取引をしたくなりましたよ」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza palidece.{/n} «Es usted muy persuasiv{mf|o|a}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Me siento motivada para ponerme manos a la obra ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."

languages.text: {n}Ryzza erbleicht.{/n} "Ihr könnt sehr überzeugend sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich fühle mich ungeheuer motiviert, sofort loszulegen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."

traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza pâlit.{/n} « Vous savez vous montrer très {mf|persuasif|persuasive}, Votre Seigneurie. Je me sens soudain très motivée et prête à me mettre immédiatement au travail. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."

languages.text: {n}Ryzza'nın benzi atıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, çok ikna edicisin. Bir an evvel anlaşalım o hâlde."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza grows pale.{/n} "You're very persuasive, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I feel distinctly motivated to get down to business at once."
